description: Extracted OCR text fails to parse into valid indicator values (RSI, MACD, etc). Affects QuantraScore accuracy.
commonCauses: OCR text contains artifacts or noise characters
Unexpected number format (commas, decimals, scientific notation)
Missing expected indicator labels in text
Text parsing regex doesn't match actual format
Multiple indicators extracted as single text block
OCR confidence low causing garbled text
solutions: Implement robust text cleaning: remove non-numeric artifacts
Use flexible parsing: support multiple number formats
Apply regex patterns for each indicator type
Validate parsed values against reasonable ranges
Implement fuzzy matching for indicator labels
Handle multiple parsing strategies with fallbacks
Log raw OCR text for debugging parsing failures
prevention: Test parsing with diverse chart screenshots
Use multiple parsing strategies with confidence scoring
Log parsing failures with raw text for improvement
Build test suite with real OCR extraction samples
Implement graceful degradation for parsing failures
